column3:
トレジャーハンターのドミダクとブリセン兄弟から
大盗賊ラムダの財宝の在処を示す暗号を手に入れた

 『若き橋架かる川面の源流の
闇夜に浮かぶ天の白滝』

一攫千金の夢は叶うのだろうか…
column4:
The treasure hunters Domidak and Prissen
accidentally hinted at a riddle that points to the
location of treasure hidden by Misko, the
Great Bandit.

\"The little twin steps over the little river.
My cave rests above that river's source.\"

It could be that finding this treasure will grant
you riches beyond measure...

column3:
トレジャーハンターの兄弟から手に入れた
大盗賊ラムダの財宝の在処を示す暗号

 『若き橋架かる川面の源流の
闇夜に浮かぶ天の白滝』

無事暗号を解き明かし
大盗賊ラムダの財宝を手に入れた
column4:
You got a riddle from the treasure hunters about
a treasure hidden by someone called Misko,
the Great Bandit:

\"The little twin steps over the little river.
My cave rests above that river's source.\"

You managed to crack the riddle and locate
the treasure!
